title: Campaign Delivery Logs
description: Campaign Delivery Events such as sent, bounces, failures.

xdm:externalId.title: External Identifier
xdm:externalId.description: External Identifier that defines the primary identity value for profile and audience.

xdm:campaignId.title: Campaign Identifier
xdm:campaignId.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign to which activity originating this message belongs to.

xdm:campaignName.title: Campaign Name
xdm:campaignName.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the Campaign.

xdm:campaignLabel.title: Campaign Label
xdm:campaignLabel.description: A human-friendly label of the marketing campaign which is originating this message.

xdm:broadlogId.title: Delivery Log Identifier
xdm:broadlogId.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign delivery log this event belongs to.

xdm:visitorId.title: Visitor Identifier
xdm:visitorId.description: Visitor that was targeted as part of the delivery.

xdm:recipientId.title: Recipient Identifer
xdm:recipientId.description: Recipient that was targeted as part of this delivery.

xdm:serviceId.title: Service Identifier
xdm:serviceId.description: Subscribed Service that targeted this delivery.

xdm:deliveryName.title: Delivery Name
xdm:deliveryName.description: Internal Name that uniquely identifies the delivery.

xdm:deliveryLabel.title: Delivery Label
xdm:deliveryLabel.description: A human-friendly label of the delivery which is originating this message.

xdm:deliveryMode.title: Delivery Mode
xdm:deliveryMode.description: Mode of delivery for the messages sent.

xdm:quarantine.title: Quarantine
xdm:quarantine.description: Address moved to quarantine. The quarantine is set to `true` when the message failed to deliver in a way that indicates that no future messages will be deliverable either to this address.

xdm:controlGroupMember.title: Control Group Member
xdm:controlGroupMember.description: The recipient of this message is a member of a control group for this campaign activity. A control group is a population which will not receive the delivery; it is used to track post-delivery behavior and campaign impact by making a comparison between the control group (or hold out group) with the behavior of target population, which has received the delivery.

xdm:seedMember.title: Seed Member
xdm:seedMember.description: The recipient of this message is a member of a seed list for this campaign activity. Seed addresses are used to include recipients who do not match the defined target criteria. Seed members could be your marketing team or other stakeholders who are interested in tracking/measuring the quality of the campaign. SeedMembers get the actual message, at the same time with regular recipients, even when the seedMember does not qualify to be a regular recipient.

xdm:proofMember.title: Proof Member
xdm:proofMember.description: The recipient of this message is a member of the proof group for this campaign activity. The proof is a special message that lets you test a delivery before sending to the main target. Proof recipients are responsible for approving both the form and content of the message. It is a pre-delivery target.

xdm:status.title: Message Status
xdm:status.description: Indicates status of the message that is being delivered.

xdm:reason.title: Reason
xdm:reason.description: The reason why the message could/would not be delivered.
